00044         public View(string Name,Database ParentDatabase)
00045         {
00046             this.Name = Name;
00047             this.ParentDatabase = ParentDatabase;

00049         }

00067 
00075         public void AddColumn(string ColumnName, string ColumnType, int MaxLength, bool Nullable)
00076         {
00077             Columns.Add(new Column(ColumnName, ColumnType, MaxLength, Nullable, false, false, false, false, "", "", "", this));
00078         }
